name: Ok! Kimonos Adult Premium Tiger BJJ gi
description:
**Pre-order begins today and will end December 12.  Gis are expected to arrive around the end of January**

Gi Specs:

Jacket
	550gsm GOLD weave jacket
	Orange Lapel Piping
	Orange Contrast stiching
	Extra reinforcements in critical areas
		
Pants (2 pairs)
	12oz ripstop pants and 12oz canvas pants
	Knee reinforcements extend to bottom of pant leg
	Gold weave gusset (crotch)
	Extra reinforcements in critical areas
	6 belt loops with stretchy rope drawstring
	Orange contrast stitching



Sizing:
*Please if you have any questions about sizing, don't hesitate to email me at okkimonos@gmail.com before you purchase*

U.S. Sizing 
A0 - 5'0" - 5'4" - 110 -135lbs 
A0T - 5'4" - 5'8" - 100 -130lbs 
A1 - 5'4" - 5'8" - 130 -165lbs. 
A1T - 5'8" - 5'11" - 130 - 160lbs 
A2 - 5'8" - 5'11" - 165 - 195lbs 
A2T - 5'11" - 6'2" - 160 - 190lbs 
A2H - 5'7" - 5'10" - 225 - 260lbs 
A3 - 5'11" - 6'2" - 195-225lbs 
A3T - 6'1" - 6'4" - 190 - 230lbs 
A4 - 6'1" - 6'4" - 230-250lbs 
A5 - 6'4" - 6'6" - 250-280lbs


Adult Metric Sizing coming soon

name: Ok! Kimonos KIDS Premium Tiger BJJ Gi (Black)
description:
**Pre-order begins today and will end December 12.  Gis are expected to arrive around the end of January**

Finally! A kids BJJ gi with all of the features that you've come to love on adult gis.

Sizing:

*Please if you have any questions about sizing, don't hesitate to email me at okkimonos@gmail.com before you purchase*


Benefits: 
The gi won't be too scratchy 
The gi won't be too hot for your child 
They'll be excited to wear their gi and to go to class 
The gi will fit them properly 
The pants will not come untied every 5 minutes during training. 

Features:
Super-soft lightweight gold weave jacket 
First-ever kids gi with lapel piping!
2 pairs of pants! (Ripstop and canvas cotton) with a gold weave gusset 
Stretchy rope (cord) drawstring 
Awesome embroidery and patches 
No contrast
Fully preshrunk

U.S. Sizing 
M0 - 3'7"-3'11" 40-60lbs 
M1 - 3'10"-4'3" 55-75lbs 
M2 - 4'2" - 4'7" 65-85lbs. 
M3 - 4'6 - 4'10" 75-95lbs. 
M4/A0 - 4'9" - 5'1" 85-115lbs.

Metric Sizing 
M0 - 109-119cm 18-27kg 
M1 - 117-130cm 25-34kg 
M2 - 127-140cm 29-39kg 
M3 - 137-147cm 34-43kg 
M4/A0 - 145-155cm 39-52kg

Artwork by famed BJJ artist and gi designer Meerkatsu!

name: Ok! Kimonos Tora Spats
description:
Product will ship in approximately 3-4 weeks.

Check the images to the left for sizing!


Official Stats:
+10 to leglocks
+7% swagger
-25% Intimidation

name: Ok! Kimonos "Sakuraba Knows" T-shirt
description:
What exactly does Kazushi Sakuraba know?
Sakuraba knows how to armbar a t-rex
Sakuraba knows how to kneebar a Redwood tree
Sakuraba knows how to hit a low single on an orca whale
Sakuraba knows how to draw amazing robot cats in photoshop
Sakuraba knows how to fly off the top ropes
Sakuraba knows how to make an entrance

Upon donning this t-shirt, you may instantly know the same.  Please send photos of t-rex, orca, and redwood.

Results may vary.

These shirts are currently in production and will arrive in 7-10 days.

name: No JMMA No Life t-shirt
description:
**This shirt is currently in pre-sale. Shirts are in production and will be completed in 7-10 business days and shipped soon after.**



Some of your grew up on the UFC. I grew up on Japanese MMA...

name: JMMA 'True Originals' T-shirt
description:
**This shirt is currently in pre-sale. Shirts are in production and will be completed in 7-10 business days and shipped soon after.**

Some of you grew up on UFC. I grew up on Japanese MMA.

Shirt comes in your favorite color. As long as your favorite color is black.

name: Original Kid T-Shirt
description:
**This shirt is currently in pre-sale. Shirts are in production and will be completed in 7-10 business days and shipped soon after.**

This shirt holds a lot of personal meaning for me. The design was kept simple and bold to let the words speak for themselves.

Not only does it pay homage a famous (and sometimes infamous) mma fighter, one of my OGs of Japanese mma, but it strikes at the heart of my feelings about being children of God (Kami No Ko), and the necessity to be original.

In whatever form that may be.

One of my goals for Ok Kimonos is to celebrate and be inspired by Original kids from our culture and others. Whether you are a fighter, musician, athlete, artist, designer, blogger, or student of the game, if you're an original, you're with us. Be Yourself. Be Foolish.  Be An Original Kid.

name: Neo Tokyo 'True Originals' T-shirt
description: **This shirt is currently in pre-sale. Shirts are in production and will be completed in 7-10 business days and shipped soon after.**

name: Basic Adult Jiu Jitsu Gi (IN STOCK)
description: **PRE-ORDER** GIS WILL SHIP IN ROUGHLY 10 WEEKS** Once people saw our kids gis, we were flooded with requests to make them in adult sizes! The Basic Adult Jiu Jitsu gi is an alternative to the more blinged-out Premium Adult gi. As with our kids gis, all artwork is by famed BJJ artist and gi designer Meerkatsu! Premium Adult Jiu Jitsu Gi: Jacket Details: 450gsm Lightweight Gold Weave Fully reinforced Contrast stitching Understated branding and embroidery Trouser Details 12oz ripstop Gold Weave Gusset Stretchy rope drawstring 6 belt loops Contrast stitching Understated branding and embroidery Sizing: *Please if you have any questions about sizing, don't hesitate to email me at okkimonos@gmail.com before you purchase* US Sizing A0 - 5'0" - 5'4" - 110 -135lbs A0T - 5'4" - 5'8" - 100 -130lbs A1 - 5'4" - 5'8" - 130 -165lbs. A1T - 5'8" - 5'11" - 130 - 160lbs A2 - 5'8" - 5'11" - 165 - 195lbs A2T - 5'11" - 6'2" - 160 - 190lbs A2H - 5'7" - 5'10" - 225 - 260lbs A3 - 5'11" - 6'2" - 195-225lbs A3T - 6'1" - 6'4" - 190 - 230lbs A4 - 6'1" - 6'4" - 230-250lbs A5 - 6'4" - 6'6" - 250-280lbs Metric Sizing Size chart coming soon

name: A Bathing Tiger Camo Sling Bag
description:
It's not exactly a 'Bag of Holding' and nor is a $200 backpack imported from Japan, but it's PERFECT for:

carrying your gear to the academy
transporting small mammals
holding your lightsaber and a thermal detonator
raiding a dragon's lair

After purchase, please send photo of lightsaber and/or dragon's lair raid.

name: Ok Kimonos Gi Patches
description:
Many of these patches were previously only available to sponsored athletes. Now you can have one too!

Dimensions:
Logo - 10" x 6"
Tall - 8" x 10"
Lapel - 12" by 4"
Snow Leopard - 9" x 9"
Kids - 7" x 9"
Original 9" x 7"
Camo - 9" x 9"

name: Ok! Kimonos "Original" T-shirt
description:
This t-shirt comes in your favorite color! As long as your favorite color is orange. Which it is, right?

Printed on 100% cotton athletic fit t-shirt in the USA.

Design by Scott Miller.
